It didn't work for me when I was running a torrent program. I shut the program down and then it worked fine.  Make sure you don't have any security programs or other programs running.

Thank you for your highly detailed and extremelely well assembled uploads! Each and every one is in a class of its own! Top tier software! Everything I used was flawless in every aspect! Much obliged pirate!
Cannot activate Windows 8 Pro with Media Center
Cannot activate Windows 8 Pro with Media Center.

pro wmc is retail only. KMS is volume activation, so you need normal pro, pro N, pro vl, pro N vl, enterprise, or enterprise N...

It says so right in the description...
thanks for this! will try.. but does it unlock the personalization settings? can we change wallpapers etc.?
You can do everything you would normally do with windows. This program does not hack system files.

ou must know, that MS deactivated my Windows 8 pro and Office 2013 this morning. There was the message that I did used software to activate Windows. Installation key was removed.  Tried to use KMSnano once more, but it not worked. 
Earlier used KMSnano about 4 times to increase lease time. It was experimental installation. :)
